name: InMemorium
description:
Travel with your master, The Necromancer, and help him resurrect his friends from the realm of the dead.

You are a special creature names a blob. and you are meant to DIE.

Blobs have the memories of their past selves and they can use those memories to change to adapt, with the power of Evolution!

Solves mazes and puzzles in this new side scroller game, where dying isn't so bad.
